name: Broken Apart (BishoyMilad)
description:
A shattered mirror caused a girl to see her own shadow become a whole new person and after being teleported to the Fortress of Projection, they have to help each other and find all the broken shards in those chambers (Amber moves in a Top-Down perspective while Umbra moves in a Platformer perspective -as she's a shadow trapped in the shadow layers of the chambers-)  .

Controls

Motion: W A S D or Arrows or Gamepad-Dpad

Switch between Amber and Umbra: F or Right Click

Placing the box (Amber only): H or Enter or Space or Gamepad-Triangle

Reseting the Level: R

Muting the Music: M

All of the assets, I made them from scratch during the gamejam period:

for the music I used virtualpiano.net to make my own music

-This is my first game ever and I hope that you like the concept that I was trying to reach-
